quotes.text: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive, to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: If it is not right, do not do it. If it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a great deal of it.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: He who is brave is free.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: No man is free who is not master of himself.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: Man is not worried by real problems so much as by his imagined anxieties about real problems.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: No great thing is created suddenly, any more than a bunch of grapes or a fig.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: Only the educated are free.
quotes.author: epictetus

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: The wise man is one who knows what he does not know.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: Silence is a source of great strength.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
quotes.author: lao_tzu

quotes.text: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: Know yourself and you will win all battles.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: The greatest victory is that which requires no battle.
quotes.author: sun_tzu

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
quotes.author: socrates

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: plato

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
quotes.author: plato

quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: plato

quotes.text: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.author: plato

quotes.text: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: plato

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: In individuals, insanity is rare; but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy.
quotes.author: nietzsche

quotes.text: There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: Do nothing that is of no use.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: Today is victory over yourself of yesterday; tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: The only way that we can live is if we grow. The only way we can grow is if we change.
quotes.author: musashi

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
quotes.author: rumi

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: The trouble is, you think you have time.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: buddha

quotes.text: The only constant in life is change.
quotes.author: heraclitus

quotes.text: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it is not the same river and he is not the same man.
quotes.author: heraclitus

quotes.text: Character is destiny.
quotes.author: heraclitus

quotes.text: Big results require big ambitions.
quotes.author: heraclitus

quotes.text: Much learning does not teach understanding.
quotes.author: heraclitus

quotes.text: Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see.
quotes.author: schopenhauer
quotes.source: The World as Will and Representation

quotes.text: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone; and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom.
quotes.author: schopenhauer

quotes.text: Compassion is the basis of morality.
quotes.author: schopenhauer

quotes.text: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
quotes.author: schopenhauer
quotes.source: The World as Will and Representation

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: aristotle

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
quotes.author: confucius

quotes.text: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: If someone is able to show me that what I think or do is not right, I will happily change.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: marcus_aurelius

quotes.text: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Life is long if you know how to use it.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Hang on to your youthful enthusiasms â€” you'll be able to use them better when you're older.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Make the mind tougher by exposing it to adversity.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: Only a man who has felt ultimate despair is capable of feeling ultimate bliss.
quotes.author: seneca

quotes.text: People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.
quotes.author: epictetus
